attributes.additional_details:
Please help us prevent The Broadwalk café, Whitley Bay being demolished. The council have stated that they want to knock the café down because they want to replace it with a kiosk to help improve the views and also that they have trouble securing good tenants to make the café a success. Which are very poor reasons to demolish a lovely usable property/business.

Please sign and share with as many people as possible to help save this lovely iconic Whitley Bay building.
